item.description:
For our second Book & Brew meet-up, The Elegant universe seems like a good book.


Here is what a Book and Brew Event is meant to be:

It's basically a SOCIAL event that includes reading a book and getting together once a month (at a pub/restaurant) to discuss the book, Then having some beer and grabbing a bite(if you're hungry). This Book & Brew meet-up, which I hope to offer once a month, is aimed at sharing, good, scientific literature, philosophical literature, inspiring stories, and the occasional piece of fiction in a social atmosphere.

This month we will try a Book Then Brew style, i.e. we will discuss the book in a private lounge at Evans complex and go for a beer after. The Place is 100 Memorial drive, Cambridge MA its a 2 minute walk from Kendall/MIT on the red line. My number is the one posted with the location, call me if have any issues getting there.





Preview of the book
item.how_to_find_us: The place is a 2 minute walk from Kendall/MIT on the red line. and its at the Sky Room. Call me if you have any questions(7743604702)
item.name: January Book, Then Brew! (The Elegant Universe, Brian Greene)
